reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and challenging assignments. Very knowledgeable in her field.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Makes complex concepts easy to understand. Always available for questions.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Decent instructor, but lectures can be dry. Lab sessions are well-organized.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Assignments are thought-provoking and fair.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Inspiring professor. Her research experience adds depth to the course material.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Struggles to explain complex topics. Office hours are not very helpful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of texts. Encourages class discussions effectively.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Lab safety is a top priority.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer. Relates course material to real-world issues effectively.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex economic theories. Fair grader.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips to museums are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Balanced view on political issues. Could improve on time management in class.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex environmental issues. Fieldwork is well-organized.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in lectures. Projects are interesting but poorly explained.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fantastic teacher. Makes linguistics accessible and fun.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but lectures can be overwhelming. Extra study sessions are helpful.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience to the classroom. Group projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Field studies are eye-opening experiences.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Explains concepts clearly but exams are very difficult. Helpful office hours.
